title: His Wants
description: Chase Thornton is not the kind of man you cross; so when he learns something damaging about his fianc√© the dominant male sets his sights on her much younger sister Delia to exact sweet revenge in a way that will tear an already shattered family apart while thrusting the young innocent Delia into a world of sensual bliss at the hands of the man who wants to own her completely.
author: Jordan Silver
